Enversa employs a Wall Street style trading platform, which executes millions of dollars in media trades per year. With 55 straight months of profitability, Enversa developed into one of the most successful performance based marketing service providers in the country that boasts a list of over 75 successful client engagements.

In August of 2008, Mr. Pickren merged Enversa with a public entity, CornerWorld, Inc. and within six months participated in CornerWorldâ€™s buy-out of Woodland Wireless, an application services provider that processes 12 million calls annually for the foremost wireless carriers in the nation. Mr. Pickren serves as Chief Marketing Officer of CornerWorld and directly manages its largest group of employees.

With over ten years of experience, Marc Pickren has excelled in executive management positions with top companies such as TMP Worldwide/Monster and JWT, and he was a key player in one of the most successful IPOâ€™s of the late 1990s. As Vice President for TMP Worldwide/Monster, Mr. Pickren fostered global sales and operated the Education Services vertical. At JWT, Mr. Pickren became a founding partner of a direct marketing services group and was responsible for North American sales and operations.

As an online marketing pioneer, Mr. Pickren brings strategic insight from the media operations, technology and media trading arenas to Enversa Companies. As a leader, he is celebrated for his vivacity, his ability to think spatially and his dedication to generating profit.
